themes: centering BIPOC, queer, and femme voices
community healing and sensuality in the arts
funding and accessibility for bold artistic work
key_phrases: blend performance, poetry, movement, and visual storytelling
rooted in culture, sensuality, and community healing
platforms that center BIPOC, queer, and femme voices
experimental formats—not just traditional stage shows
spaces where artists can take risks, collaborate across mediums
poetry-infused burlesque, interactive installations, ritual performance, sensory-based experiences

insufficient funding and accessibility for bold artistic work
solutions_proposed: create more multidisciplinary, immersive art experiences
